name: odontology
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the scientific study of the structure and diseases of teeth, especially in order to identify people and help solve crimes: The Armed Forces Institute of Pathology offers week-long dental courses in odontology and pathology.
More examplesFewer examplesBriley had first been identified by DNA and odontology. Burkes is a New York dentist who heads the forensic odontology team.He was a controversial odontologist who once was suspended by the odontology board.
